\FX[F]\AA[F]\M[FadeIn]\F[1010Furea_0009]\N<Flare>Ugh, ugh...

\FX[F]\AA[F]\F[1010Furea_0000]\N<Flare>Huh?... Eliza-san, where are we? And, where is Lord
Kenji...?

\FX[F]\AA[FFFFF]\MMMMM[InL]\F[1010Furea_0005]\FFFFF[1020Eriza_0000]\N<Eliza>You're awake. That fool Kenji passed out, so we're having
him undergo a thorough examination, just in case.

\FX[F]\AA[FFFFF]\F[1010Furea_0005]\FFFFF[1020Eriza_0003]\N<Eliza>Well, even from an amateur's perspective like mine, it
seemed like there was nothing wrong with him.
\FX[F]\AA[FFFFF]\F[1010Furea_0005]\FFFFF[1020Eriza_0004]\N<Eliza>...Now, as for where we are...

\FX[F]\AA[FFFFF]\F[1010Furea_0005]\FFFFF[1020Eriza_0003]\N<Eliza>Welcome to our secret organization, "JusticeKnights," also
known as "JK." This is the base of our secret organization
"JusticeKnights."
\FX[F]\AA[F]\F[1010Furea_0006]\FFFFF[1020Eriza_0003]\N<Flare>"JusticeKnights"...? I've never heard of it...

\FX[F]\AA[FFFFF]\F[1010Furea_0006]\FFFFF[1020Eriza_0003]\N<Eliza>Well, it's a secret organization, after all (laughs) First,
let me explain about that. Listen carefully.

\N<Eliza>First of all, suddenly, but currently, our humanity is
facing a crisis of existence. The "crisis" is caused by the
opponent we just faced, the Black Blizzard gang.
\N<Flare>Wha... Whaaaaat!? I've never heard of such a thing...!?

\N<Eliza>Of course, you haven't. Imagine if such a thing were to be
broadcasted on the news. It would lead to chaos and
disorder.

\N<Eliza>Citizens losing their composure, riots, looting happening.
It would be full of opportunities for the enemy!! It would
only be convenient for them.
\N<Flare>I see... So that's why we "ordinary people" weren't told...

\N<Eliza>Well, you're no longer an "ordinary person" but on our side
now (laughs)
\N<Flare>Ugh...um...what does that mean...

\N<Eliza>Hmm, I will explain it now. The Black Blizzard gang, also
known as the BB gang, releases villains called "monsters"
and causes destruction everywhere.

\N<Eliza>These monsters are powerful...as you have witnessed,
ordinary people can't stand a chance against them...
\N<Flare>Indeed...their strength was not ordinary...

\N<Flare>But, why was I able to fight on equal terms with those
"monsters"?
\N<Eliza>Hmm, good question. Now, let me explain about Pure Flame...
\FX[F]\AA[FFFFF]\MMMMM[jump]\F[1010Furea_0006]\FFF[1020Eriza_0000]\FFFFF[9010Hakui]\N<Researcher>It's terrible!! Eliza-san, it's, it's terrible!!

\FX[F]\FX[FFF]\AA[FFF]\MMM[jump]\F[1010Furea_0006]\FFF[1020Eriza_0002]\FFFFF[9010Hakui]\N<Eliza>What's the matter!! Coming in without knocking, I'm in the

\FX[F]\FX[FFF]\AA[FFFFF]\MMMMM[jump]\F[1010Furea_0006]\FFF[1020Eriza_0002]\FFFFF[9010Hakui]\N<Researcher>I'm sorry!! But, something terrible has happened!! Eliza-

\FX[F]\FX[FFF]\AA[FFF]\F[1010Furea_0006]\FFF[1020Eriza_0007]\FFFFF[9010Hakui]\N<Eliza>The lab... The leader of the research team is "him," but I
am...
\FX[F]\FX[FFF]\AA[FFFFF]\MMMMM[jump]\F[1010Furea_0006]\FFF[1020Eriza_0007]\FFFFF[9010Hakui]\N<Researcher>It's about Eliza-san's friend, it's terrible!!
